properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 1:59PM AKST until January 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to
16 inches.

* WHERE...Skagway, Dyea and the Klondike Highway.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 6 PM AKST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy, wet snow will make snow removal
difficult. Some mixing with rain is possible in the Thursday
afternoon near Skagway.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 PM AKST FRIDAY
